summary: Worker marketplace platform with admin panel tracking materials/services posted by workers

existing_features.title: Store the worker identity (name and ID) with each material submission so the system can track which worker uploaded which material
Store the worker identity (name and ID) with each service/worker profile submission so the system can track attribution
Display worker attribution information (name and ID) for each material in the admin panel so the website owner knows who uploaded it
Display worker attribution information (name and ID) for each service posting in the admin panel
Organize admin panel data into separate tabs: one for materials, one for services/workers, and one for general contact messages

new_feature_requests.summary: Display which worker posted each material/service in admin panel
Organize admin data into separate tabs
